data.name: 黎明生机:启示录-Survival:Revelation
data.detailed_description:
This game is the first work of the beautiful boy personal studio First released in 2019, after two years, after continuous improvement of production technology, finally ushered in the first update, this update completely reformed the entire game framework, all written in C++, and optimized the WAN online and LAN online system, the future of this game will be online-based, the current game still has a lot of places to optimize, the work will continue to update, because it is a personal work, and I can only use spare time to produce, so the update progress will be slightly slower Thank you for your understanding and support.


Pretty Boy Personal Studio thank you for your support!!!
data.about_the_game:
This game is the first work of the beautiful boy personal studio First released in 2019, after two years, after continuous improvement of production technology, finally ushered in the first update, this update completely reformed the entire game framework, all written in C++, and optimized the WAN online and LAN online system, the future of this game will be online-based, the current game still has a lot of places to optimize, the work will continue to update, because it is a personal work, and I can only use spare time to produce, so the update progress will be slightly slower Thank you for your understanding and support.


Pretty Boy Personal Studio thank you for your support!!!
data.short_description: implements the basic game framework for the Dawn Life series of games by Pretty Boy's personal studio

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete graphics
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Close the input method before opening the game
